name: circular_dependency
bug_description: Circular dependency - OrderService -> PaymentService -> OrderService. PaymentService injects OrderService and calls orderService.getOrderStatus() in processPayment(), creating a circular bean dependency that will fail at startup.
bug_anchor: // BUG: Circular dependency - PaymentService depends on OrderService
correct_implementation: Use @Lazy annotation on one of the injected dependencies, use setter injection instead of field injection, or refactor to break the cycle by extracting shared logic into a separate service
